save_formset(request, form, formset, change)[source]¶

Saves the formset with the modified Projekt object.

Parameters:
  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object from which the logged in user is determined.
  • form (Form or ModelForm) – The Django form from which the POST request originates.
  • formset (Formset) – The formset to be saved.
  • change –

    ?
save_model(request, obj, form, change)[source]¶

Auto populate ForeignKey field ‘ersteller’ on save in admin site

Parameters:
  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object from which the logged in user is determined.
  • obj (Aufgabe) – The Aufgabe object to be populated with the ForeignKey of the logged in user.
  • form (Form or ModelForm) – The Django form from which the POST request originates.
  • change –

    ?

tests Module¶

class teamhub.tests.TestCase(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

Sets the basic test environment. This function is called before every unit test.

Unit tests concerning Aufgabe objects.

Unit tests concerning Projekt objects.

Unit tests concerning search functionality.

views Module¶

teamhub.views.aufgabe(request)[source]¶

The view creates the input form for creating new tasks.

teamhub.views.aufgabeBearbeiten(request, aufgabeId)[source]¶

Depending on the request type this view changes a Aufgabe object or provides an input form to modify data of a Aufgabe object.

Parameters:aufgabeId (int) – The foreign key of the Aufgabe object to be modified.
teamhub.views.aufgabeDetails(request, aufgabeId)[source]¶

Gives the detail view of a given Aufgabe object.

Parameters:aufgabeId (int) – The foreign key of the Aufgabe to be displayed.
teamhub.views.aufgabeErstellen(request)[source]¶

Depending on the request type this view creates a new Aufgabe objects or provides an input form to create a new Aufgabe object.

teamhub.views.benutzerErstellen(request)[source]¶

Depending on the request type this view either creates a new user in the system, or displays an input form to create a new user.

teamhub.views.dashboard(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

The landing page view. It gets all tasks which are assigned to the logged in user.

teamhub.views.logoutUser(request)[source]¶

Logs the current user out of the system and redirects to the login screen.

teamhub.views.makeContext(context)¶

Adds default keys to the context dictionary. These are used site wide.

Parameters:context (Dictionary) – The view context dictionary to be appended.
teamhub.views.projektBearbeiten(request, projektId)[source]¶

Depending on the request type this view changes a Projekt object or provides an input form to modify data of a Projekt object.

Parameters:projektId (int) – The primary key of the Projekt object to be modified.
teamhub.views.projektDetail(request, projektId)[source]¶

Gives the detail view of a project.

Parameters:projektId (int) – The primary key of the project to be displayed.
teamhub.views.projektErstellen(request)[source]¶

Depending on the request type this view creates a new Projekt object or provides an input form to create a new Projekt object.

teamhub.views.projektListe(request)[source]¶

Gives a list of all projects in the system.

teamhub.views.search(request)¶

Implementierung einer einfachen suche. Es wird in Titel und Beschreibung gesucht.

teamhub.views.userProfilBearbeiten(request)[source]¶

Allows a user to modify her profile data.
